settings.ftueAnnotation: Subtitle annotation features are now available.
settings.annotationNoExtensionWarn: Installing the asbplayer extension is recommended to prevent your browser from deleting manually stored words. Export your settings before installing the extension to preserve your data.
settings.annotationLocalAnkiHelperText: Word status is determined by your local collection then from Anki cards. Collect words locally through imports or by hovering over words and using the keyboard shortcuts.
settings.buildAnkiCacheHelperText: The cache is automatically updated during playback when a track is enabled and Anki is connectable.
settings.buildAnkiCacheAnkiEnableHelperText: Configure word fields and/or sentence fields to use Anki for known words.
settings.ankiCacheDependentSettingsHelperText: Changing "{{field}}" could invalidate the Anki cache, trigger a rebuild now or have it done automatically on your next playback when this track is enabled and Anki is connectable.
settings.dictionaryColorizeSubtitles: Colorize subtitles based on known words
